resourceTemplates.name: opengraph-get-open-graph
resourceTemplates.title: Get Open Graph metadata for a website
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves Open Graph and HTML-inferred metadata (title, description, image, etc.) from a given URL.

resourceTemplates.name: opengraph-extract-site
resourceTemplates.title: Extract text and elements from a website
resourceTemplates.description: Extracts text content from specific HTML elements (title, headings, paragraphs, etc.) on a web page.

resourceTemplates.name: opengraph-scrape-site
resourceTemplates.title: Scrape full HTML of a website
resourceTemplates.description: Returns the full raw HTML source of the specified website for analysis or parsing.

resourceTemplates.name: opengraph-get-screenshot
resourceTemplates.title: Capture screenshot of a website
resourceTemplates.description: Captures a full-page or viewport screenshot of a given website with optional format, quality, and dimensions.

resourceTemplates.name: opengraph-get-oembed
resourceTemplates.title: Get oEmbed data for a website
resourceTemplates.description: Returns embeddable HTML representation of a website (iframe, provider, width, height).

resourceTemplates.name: opengraph-query-site
resourceTemplates.title: Query website for main headline or summary
resourceTemplates.description: Lets the AI ask a question about a website, such as 'What is the main headline?'.
